title: USA TODAY Content Now Available in Over One Million GM Connected Cars
text:
CLOSE

USA TODAY on GM's Connected Car Dash (Photo: USA TODAY and General Motors)

USA TODAY NETWORK recently announced a partnership with General Motors for its updated connected car dashboard.

Beginning this week, Chevrolet, Buick, GMC and Cadillac will update more than one million existing vehicles with new entertainment, news and music applications available through the infotainment touchscreen - featuring the USA TODAY app.



Drivers will have the option to download the USA TODAY app and listen to five of its podcasts free of charge. The app is a feature of GM’s in-vehicle application services and can be accessed through Chevrolet, Buick and GMC “Shop” and Cadillac “Collection”.

With topics ranging from news and true crime to sports and tech, USA TODAY podcasts will be accessible via the dashboard of your car—a feature providing easier access for drivers.

The podcasts will be listed on the vehicle’s home screen. The five podcasts currently available are as follows:

5 Things: The news you need to know to start your day. Five stories. Less than five minutes. Every weekday, plus Saturdays. Powered by the USA TODAY Network and hosted by Taylor Wilson.



Accused: (Season 2) A soft-hearted prison minister was found killed in her Kentucky apartment, and Newport police zeroed in on an ex-convict she’d counseled. Thirty years later, the conviction is overturned and the case is once again unsolved. The Cincinnati Enquirer investigates: Was William Virgil wrongly convicted for murder?



I Tell My Husband the News: Shannon Green, a journalist at USA TODAY, tells her husband Dusty Terrill, a local comedian, the news stories of the week that he most likely missed in this weekly podcast.



Talking Tech: Jefferson Graham's daily USA TODAY Talking Tech podcast offers a quick hit on the hottest new gadgets, tech news & apps and chats with tech insiders. Talking Tech is USA TODAY's most listened to podcast, with over 55 million downloads. Graham is a USA TODAY tech columnist & also hosts the Talking Tech video series.



NBA A to Z: Sam Amick and Jeff Zillgitt, two of the best and most respected journalists covering the NBA for the USA TODAY Network, get fans inside the game with this weekly podcast series. On each show, you will hear about what’s going on behind the scenes about the league and your favorite teams, including interviews of the top people in the game – players, coaches, executives – to give you more of the story. Amick and Zillgitt also break down the league, discussing who’s hot and who’s not, what trends you should be aware of and answer your questions.

To more information, visit onstar.com for vehicle availability, details and system limitations. Services and connectivity vary by model, conditions and location. Requires active OnStar service and data plan. Data plans provided by AT&T or your connected device’s carrier.
